body:
<!-- Please only use this template for submitting reports about failing tests in Kubernetes CI jobs -->

**Which jobs are failing**:

containerd-l2bridge-windows-master
containerd-overlay-windows-master

**Which test(s) are failing**:

[k8s.io] Container Runtime blackbox test when running a container with a new image should be able to pull from private registry with secret [NodeConformance]

**Since when has it been failing**:

Unknown.

**Testgrid link**:

https://testgrid.k8s.io/sig-windows#containerd-l2bridge-windows-master
https://testgrid.k8s.io/sig-windows#containerd-overlay-windows-master

**Reason for failure**:

When creating the container, the following error occurs:

    Failed: Error: failed to create containerd task: hcsshim::CreateComputeSystem image-pull-test: The container operating system does not match the host operating system.

Windows Server 2019 is used in the testing environment, and the image ``gcr.io/authenticated-image-pulling/windows-nanoserver:v1`` is supposed to be based on the ``windows/nanoserver:1809`` image, and the test is passing in all other jobs that are using docker instead of containerd.

But the image ``gcr.io/authenticated-image-pulling/windows-nanoserver:v1`` has been built at the beggining of 2019, so it's most likely outdated (the Microsoft official images are updated regularly), which could lead to the OS version mismatch.

Note that most of the other tests are passing for the containerd jobs, which are using the test images hosted in the ``e2eteam`` registry, which are based on the ``mcr.microsoft.com/windows/servercore:ltsc2019`` image (LTS 2019 and 1809 have the same OS version), and they're always up-to-date.

One solution could be to republish the ``gcr.io/authenticated-image-pulling/windows-nanoserver:v1`` image based on a freshly pulled nanoserver image.

**Anything else we need to know**:

/sig windows
/sig testing

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a consistently or frequently failing test.
labels.name: kind/failing-test

title: tests: should be able to pull from private registry with secret on Windows containerd
